des:
Alexa and the Life in Sync skill gives everyone a more simple, efficient and colorful everyday routine. Share, create and manage your life’s lighting with the official Life in Sync skill.Let your lights come to life by naming, grouping and sharing your smart bulbs. Use color to express the moment’s mood, time of day or daily activity. 

Rest easy knowing your lights will turn on or off right when you want no matter where you are. With the tap of a finger or simple voice control, Life in Sync syncs the lights in your life.

Let Your Lights Come to Life: 
 To turn bulbs on/off, simply tell Alexa to turn on <bulb name> or <group name>.
o “Alexa, turn on Smart Bulb.” 
o “Alexa, turn off Bedroom Lights.” 

Set the Mood: 
 To dim bulbs, simply tell Alexa to dim <bulb name> to <desired percentage>. 
o “Alexa, dim Smart Bulb 1 to 50%.” 
o “Alexa, dim Living Room Lights to 20%.”

Express the Moment’s Mood: 
 To change the bulbs color, simply tell Alexa to turn <bulb name or group name> <desired color>.
o “Alexa, turn Smart Bulb 1 red.” 
o “Alexa, turn Hallway Lights blue.”
